name: Loki TVA TemPad
description:
TemPad™ now available on iPhone

MINI-UPDATE: Locked orientation. It's not perfect but it's a start. I just rotated Prototype screens 90 degrees. Turn rotation lock on and play from Landscape locked page

—

I had a little fun and recreated the TemPad from the Loki Disney+ series. There are a few screens from the show and additional screens that I've added to complete certain flows.


A prototype is set up as well so feel free to use this as a prop if you'd like.


If you'd like a guided tutorial on how to recreate the home screen then follow the link to my YouTube tutorial!


Now with a Part 2 on how to get this on your phone!


I plan to update and clean up the file eventually, so make sure to follow, and for now, enjoy!
